## Mutator.reconnect() method

Reconnect an block to a mutated input.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static reconnect(connectionChild: Connection, block: Block, inputName: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  connectionChild | [Connection](./blockly.connection.md) | Connection on child block. |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | Parent block. |
|  inputName | string | Name of input on parent block.  True iff a reconnection was made, false otherwise. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
